p: Some medicinal plants such as Cyamospsis tetragonolobus (Gowar plant) [ 165], Grewia asiatica (phalsa) [ 166] and Zingiber officinale Rosc (ginger) [ 166], were reported their hypoglycemic activity by moderating glucose utilization in the body [ 167]. This part only displays about Zingiber officinale Rosc. because this herb has been popular and useful in Vietnam.
